summary: This is a sealed federal indictment from the Southern District of New York charging Ghislaine Maxwell with conspiracy to entice minors to travel to engage in illegal sex acts, enticement of a minor, conspiracy to transport minors, transportation of a minor, and perjury. The indictment details her alleged role in recruiting, grooming, and facilitating the sexual abuse of multiple minor girls by Jeffrey Epstein between approximately 1994 and 1997, and her subsequent false statements under oath in 2016.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Charged with multiple federal crimes for her alleged role in recruiting, grooming, and facilitating the sexual abuse of minor girls by Jeffrey Epstein between 1994 and 1997, and for committing perjury in a 2016 deposition.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Described as the primary perpetrator who sexually abused minor girls, with Maxwell allegedly assisting him. His sexual preference for underage girls and specific abusive acts are detailed.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.context: Signed the indictment as the Acting United States Attorney and is listed as the Foreperson.

connections.description: Described as having a close personal and professional relationship; intimate partners and co-conspirators in a scheme to sexually abuse minor girls.
Maxwell was paid by Epstein to manage his various properties.
Maxwell allegedly befriended, groomed, and was present for the sexual abuse of Minor Victim-1 by Epstein, and enticed her to travel across state lines.
Maxwell allegedly interacted with and groomed Minor Victim-2 in New Mexico, including giving her an unsolicited topless massage.
Maxwell allegedly groomed Minor Victim-3 in London, introduced her to Epstein, and encouraged her to massage him knowing it would lead to sexual abuse.
Epstein sexually abused Minor Victim-1 on multiple occasions in New York and Florida, with Maxwell's facilitation.
Epstein invited Minor Victim-2 to New Mexico for the purpose of grooming and abuse.
Epstein sexually abused Minor Victim-3 on multiple occasions, including during massages arranged by Maxwell.

events.title: Conspiracy and Abuse Period
events.description: The period during which Ghislaine Maxwell and Jeffrey Epstein allegedly conspired to and did recruit, groom, and sexually abuse multiple minor girls.

events.title: Minor Victim-1 Travel from Florida to New York
events.description: Minor Victim-1 was enticed to travel from Florida to New York for the purpose of being sexually abused by Epstein at his New York residence.

events.title: Interaction with Minor Victim-2 in New Mexico
events.description: Maxwell and Epstein interacted with Minor Victim-2 at Epstein's New Mexico ranch, where Maxwell gave her an unsolicited topless massage as part of grooming.

events.title: Grooming of Minor Victim-3 in London
events.description: Maxwell groomed Minor Victim-3 in London, introduced her to Epstein, and arranged for massages that led to sexual abuse.

events.title: First Perjurious Deposition
events.description: During a civil deposition, Maxwell falsely testified she was unaware of any scheme by Epstein to recruit underage girls and denied interacting with anyone under 18 other than the plaintiff.

events.title: Second Perjurious Deposition
events.description: During a civil deposition, Maxwell gave false testimony regarding her awareness of sex toys at Epstein's home, Epstein's other sexual partners, and whether she had ever given massages.

locations: Upper East Side, Manhattan, New York (Epstein's New York Residence)
Palm Beach, Florida (Epstein's Palm Beach Residence)
Santa Fe, New Mexico (Epstein's New Mexico Ranch)
Southern District of New York (jurisdiction for legal proceedings)
keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell is charged with conspiracy, enticement, transportation, and perjury related to the sexual abuse of minors by Jeffrey Epstein.

The indictment alleges Maxwell played a central role in recruiting, grooming, and facilitating abuse of at least three minor victims (identified as Minor Victim-1, -2, -3) as young as 14 years old between 1994 and 1997.
Maxwell allegedly normalized sexual abuse for victims by discussing sexual topics, undressing in front of them, and participating in or being present for group sexual encounters with Epstein.
The abuse and grooming occurred at multiple Epstein properties in New York, Florida, New Mexico, and at Maxwell's London residence.
Maxwell committed perjury during 2016 civil depositions by denying knowledge of Epstein's scheme, her interactions with underage girls, the presence of sex toys, and that she ever gave massages.
